flawed_nl_solution:
Ofelia saves $10 x 2 = $<<10*2=20>>20 in February.
She will save $20x 2 = $<<20*2=40>>40 in March.
She will save $40 x 2 = $<<40*2=80>>80 in April.
Thus, she will save $80 x 2 = $<<80*2=610>>610 in May.
#### 610

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 610. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
